title: 'Very serious.' Denmark, Greenland fear Trump still wants to take control
shortDescription: The leaders of Denmark and Greenland do not think their Trump crisis has ended despite the start of formal talks with the White House.

title: Barack Obama responds to controversial Trump post
shortDescription: Barack Obama said in an interview that a video President Trump posted that depicted Barack and Michelle Obama as apes was part of a "clown show."

title: 'Clown show': Barack Obama responds to Trump post of Obamas as apes
shortDescription: Former President Barack Obama said a video President Donald Trump posted depicting Obama and his wife as apes was part of a shameless "clown show."

title: Trump says regime change 'would be the best thing' in Iran
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said regime change in Iran would be "the best thing," as U.S. officials seek deal with Iran over nuclear program.

title: 2028 Democrats wrestle with how to tackle Trump, approach swing voters
shortDescription: Ahead of the midterms, Democrats' 2028 jockeying is turning into a personality question for how best to handle Donald Trump and persuade swing voters.

title: Trump: Voter ID required to vote in midterms
shortDescription: President Trump insisted in a Truth Social post that voter ID would be required for the midterm elections, even if it is not approved by Congress.

title: Trump: Voter ID required for midterms even without Congress approval
shortDescription: House Republicans passed legislation on Feb. 11 that would require proof of U.S. citizenship for voters ahead of the midterm elections.

title: Obama, Newsom criticize Trump's EPA repeal
shortDescription: Former President Barack Obama and Governor Gavin Newsom criticized President Donald Trump's sweeping EPA repeal.

title: Trump tells troops at Fort Bragg Democrats would change the base's name
shortDescription: Trump told troops at Fort Bragg they should vote for Republicans because Democrats would change the base's name. He also joked about retiring there.

title: Trump on FBI role in Guthrie case
shortDescription: President Donald Trump commented on the FBI's involvement in the Nancy Guthrie case, saying local authorities are still in charge.

title: House Republicans Rebuke Trump on Canada Tariffs
shortDescription: The House rejected President Trump’s tariffs on Canada in a 219–211 vote, marking a rare bipartisan rebuke of his signature trade policy.

title: Trump's National Guard deployment isn't over in these 3 cities
shortDescription: While National Guard troops have quietly left Los Angeles, Chicago and Portland, Oregon, thousands remain in three other U.S. cities.

title: Georgia bill adds additional restrictions to gender-affirming care
shortDescription: Amendments added to a home health bill in Georgia ban puberty blockers and add restrictions to gender-affirming care in the state.
